properties.name: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E)
properties.message: PG&E provides electricity to approximately 16 million people in a 70,000-square-mile service area.

properties.name: Southern California Edison (SCE)
properties.message: SCE serves approximately 15 million people in a 50,000-square-mile area of Southern California.

properties.name: San Diego Gas & Electric (SDG&E)
properties.service_area: San Diego and southern Orange County
properties.message: SDG&E provides energy service to 3.6 million people through 1.4 million electric meters and 900,000 natural gas meters.
